messages.content: ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG is an unofficial implementation of the BRIA Background Removal v1.4 model for ComfyUI.
What is BRIA Background Removal v1.4?
BRIA Background Removal v1.4 is an open-source model developed by BRIA AI that can be used for non-commercial purposes.
What are the new features in version V1.5 of ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG?
Version V1.5 of ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG supports batch processing (can remove video backgrounds) and adds the output mask function.
You can install ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG either by using the ComfyUI Manager (recommended) or by manually cloning the repository and restarting ComfyUI.
What nodes are available in ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG?
ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG provides two nodes: ðŸ§¹BRIA_RMBG Model Loader, which automatically loads the Removal v1.4 model, and ðŸ§¹BRIA RMBG, which removes the background.
Where should you download the Removal v1.4 model to?
You should download the Removal v1.4 model to the `/custom_nodes/ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG/RMBG-1.4` directory.
When was version V1.5 of ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG released?
Version V1.5 of ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG was released on 20240207.
